name: Alonzo R. BOYD, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of October 2005, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
